title: Accessibility Settings
description: Customize your experience to make the application more accessible
menuDescription: Toggle accessibility features to customize your experience
largeTextDescription: Increases font size for better readability
reducedMotionHint: This option may also be controlled by your system preferences
focusModeDescription: Reduces distractions by highlighting active elements
noFeaturesActive: No accessibility features are currently active
keyboardShortcutsDescription: Use these keyboard shortcuts to quickly toggle accessibility features:
colorBlindDescription: Adjusts colors for different types of color blindness
dyslexicFontDescription: Uses a font designed for readers with dyslexia
readingGuideDescription: Displays a horizontal guide that follows the cursor to help with reading
soundFeedbackDescription: Provides auditory feedback for actions and notifications
